remarks: Lemma factoring out common proof steps of ~ r2alf and ~ r2al . Introduced to reduce dependencies on axioms.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 9-Jan-2020.)
statement:
r2allem.1 $e |- ( A. y ( x e. A -> ( y e. B -> ph ) ) <-> ( x e. A -> A. y ( y e. B -> ph ) ) ) $.
r2allem $p |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ph <-> A. x A. y ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> ph ) ) $.
